util

Class AudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.AudioManager

  • public class AudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Centralized point of control over the game's audio playback.
    Author:
    Enrique Martín Arenal

      • play

        public void play(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound sound,
        float volume,
        float pitch,
        float pan)
        Plays a sound taking into account the game preferences
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound that is going to be played
        volume - the volume of the sound
        pitch - the pitch of the sound
        pan - Negative pan values will play the sound only on the left audio channel whereas positive pan values will achieve the opposite.
